requestParams.name: bussiness_hours_type
requestParams.desc: 营业时间类型 1 营业、2 休息

requestParams.name: county_id
requestParams.desc: 行政区划代码。参考高德城市编码表 http://lbs.amap.com/api/webservice/download

requestParams.name: image
requestParams.desc: 图片地址列表，逗号分隔

requestParams.name: is_optional_self_fetch_time
requestParams.desc: 是否需要买家选择自提时间。1表示需要，0表示不需要

requestParams.name: is_self_fetch
requestParams.desc: 是否是自提点。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: is_store
requestParams.desc: 是否是门店。1表示是，0表示否

requestParams.name: local_delivery_scope_type
requestParams.desc: 同城配送范围划分方式：1半径 2多边形

requestParams.name: only_bussiness_hours_open
requestParams.desc: 0 否， 1 只允许营业时间下单

requestParams.name: tag_ids
requestParams.desc: 标签列表，逗号分隔。需要先创建网点分组

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['support_local_delivery']=1
params['province']="浙江省"
params['phone2']="18888888880"
params['offline_business_hours']="[{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"16:00","weekdays":["周一","周二","周三","周四","周五"]},{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"20:00","weekdays":["周六","周日"]}]"
params['name']="测试新99"
params['local_delivery_start_amount']=4000
params['local_delivery_scope']=2000
params['local_delivery_fee']=500
params['lng']="120.13265700000001"
params['lat']="30.281374"
params['is_store']=1
params['is_self_fetch']=1
params['is_optional_self_fetch_time']=1
params['image']="/upload_files/2015/10/19/Fib0cfbr47EVV1BvaulhVuCjhS5b.png"
params['id']=58804685
params['description']="description"
params['county_id']="330106"
params['city']="杭州市"
params['business_hours_advanced']="[{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"16:00","weekdays":["周一","周二","周三","周四","周五"]},{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"20:00","weekdays":["周六","周日"]}]"
params['area']="西湖区"
params['address']="黄龙万科中心"
params['phone1']="0571"
params['local_delivery_scope_type']=2
params['local_delivery_polygon']="120.122257,30.290374|120.143057,30.290374|120.143057,30.272374|120.122257,30.272374"
params['tag_ids']="18827"
params['bussiness_hours_type']=0
params['only_bussiness_hours_open']=1

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.multistore.offline.update', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'1', 'province' => '浙江省', 'phone2' => '18888888880', 'offline_business_hours' => '[{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"16:00","weekdays":["周一","周二","周三","周四","周五"]},{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"20:00","weekdays":["周六","周日"]}]', 'name' => '测试新99', 'local_delivery_start_amount' => '4000', 'local_delivery_scope' => '2000', 'local_delivery_fee' => '500', 'lng' => '120.13265700000001', 'lat' => '30.281374', 'is_store' => '1', 'is_self_fetch' => '1', 'is_optional_self_fetch_time' => '1', 'image' => '/upload_files/2015/10/19/Fib0cfbr47EVV1BvaulhVuCjhS5b.png', 'id' => '58804685', 'description' => 'description', 'county_id' => '330106', 'city' => '杭州市', 'business_hours_advanced' => '[{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"16:00","weekdays":["周一","周二","周三","周四","周五"]},{"open_time":"00:10","close_time":"20:00","weekdays":["周六","周日"]}]', 'area' => '西湖区', 'address' => '黄龙万科中心', 'phone1' => '0571', 'local_delivery_scope_type' => '2', 'local_delivery_polygon' => '120.122257,30.290374|120.143057,30.290374|120.143057,30.272374|120.122257,30.272374', 'tag_ids' => '18827', 'bussiness_hours_type' => '0', 'only_bussiness_hours_open' => '1', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(
    $client->get($method, $api_version, $my_params, $my_files)
);
echo '
